attributes.action: Reconsider the death penalty for serious crimes of torture and manslaughter/murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the brutal death of Baby P, perhaps it is time for the UK to consider reinstating the death penalty for the perpetrators of such heinous crimes. Support this petition if you agree that the death penalty should be brought back as punishment for crimes such as this one.

rejection.details:
There are seveal petitions in existence already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
